title: Library Management System
description: This project is a full stack web project that allows to manage a library system digitally with PSQL.There are to two panels in this project namely the admin and user.It digitally calculates the fine amount,sends alert to return the book and the user can also reserve the book if it is not available.

title: Post Office Management System
technologies: JSP | HTML | CSS | PSQL | Java Servlet
description: This project is a full stack web project that allows to manage a Post-Office system digitally with Java,PSQLand JSP.The JAAS authenication is implemented which enables the IAM in this project.It also contains a dynamic export module which allow users to export the tables in PDF and XLSX format.

title: Industry Specific Intelligent Fire Management System
technologies: Node-RED | IBM Watson IOT | Python | Wokwi
description: In this project the dashboard is made of NODE-RED,this system integrates with python and wokwi and deplyed on the NODE-JS .

title: Industrial Fire IOT Management System using ReactJS
description: This Dashboard displays the data from the IOT Devices and displays it on the dasboard,it also specifies the working conditions of all the equipments.
